sentences.english: An application that can run statics analysis on sports matches .
sentences.chinese: 一個應用程序可以運行在體育靜力學的研究與分析。

sentences.english: In the present paper, we discuss the magnetostatic equilibrium of the magnetic field without topological invariance.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論缺乏拓撲不變性的磁流體靜力學平衡位形。

sentences.english: The problem is placed under the division of statics.
sentences.chinese: 該問題歸結爲靜力學的範疇。

sentences.english: Statics, the physicist knows, is only an abstraction from dynamics .
sentences.chinese: 物理學家知道，靜力學只是動力學的一種抽象。

sentences.english: Angular momentum, torque, cancellation of internal torques, equations of statics.
sentences.chinese: 角動量，轉矩，內轉矩的消除，靜力學公式。

sentences.english: Static is the branch of mechanics which studies the laws of equilibrium of bodies under the action of force systems.
sentences.chinese: 靜力學是研究物體在力系作用下平衡規律的科學。

sentences.english: It is possible to determine all the bar forces by the application of the principles of statics alone.
sentences.chinese: 只要利用靜力學原理就能求出各杆的內力。

sentences.english: The stability of the helical equilibrium is analyzed in the fields of statics and dynamics respectively.
sentences.chinese: 在靜力學和動力學領域內討論其平衡穩定性問題。

sentences.english: A static model for super-thin elastic rod is described.
sentences.chinese: 闡明一類超細長彈性杆的靜力學建模問題。
